message.content:
[可實現]
[TTPs Name]

[方案一總結]
使用plistlib模塊可以方便地讀取和修改plist文件，語法簡單易懂，不需要額外安裝第三方套件。

[方案二總結]
使用xml.etree.ElementTree模塊可以解析和修改plist文件，需要遍歷元素來找到要修改的值，不需要額外安裝第三方套件。

[方案三總結]
使用plistlib和plist模塊可以解析和修改plist文件，需要將文件轉為二進制數據進行處理，需要安裝第三方套件plist。

[TTPs Name]

[方案一總結]
內容...

```python
# TTPs程式碼
import plistlib

plist = plistlib.readPlist("path/to/plist_file.plist")
plist["key"] = "new_value"
plistlib.writePlist(plist, "path/to/plist_file.plist")

# 功能測試程式碼
plist = plistlib.readPlist("path/to/plist_file.plist")
assert plist["key"] == "new_value", "Failed to modify plist value"
```

[方案二總結]
內容...

```python
# TTPs程式碼
import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET

tree = ET.parse("path/to/plist_file.plist")
root = tree.getroot()

for elem in root.iter("key"):
    if elem.text == "key_to_modify":
        elem.next_sibling.text = "new_value"

tree.write("path/to/plist_file.plist")

# 功能測試程式碼
tree = ET.parse("path/to/plist_file.plist")
root = tree.getroot()

for elem in root.iter("key"):
    if elem.text == "key_to_modify":
        assert elem.next_sibling.text == "new_value", "Failed to modify plist value"
```

[方案三總結]
內容...

```python
# TTPs程式碼
import plistlib
import plist

with open("path/to/plist_file.plist", "rb") as fp:
    plist_data = fp.read()

plist_root = plistlib.loads(plist_data)
plist_root["key"] = "new_value"

with open("path/to/plist_file.plist", "wb") as fp:
    fp.write(plistlib.dumps(plist_root))

# 功能測試程式碼
with open("path/to/plist_file.plist", "rb") as fp:
    plist_data = fp.read()

plist_root = plistlib.loads(plist_data)
assert plist_root["key"] == "new_value", "Failed to modify plist value"
```
